content: picot-edged grandma s favorite size 7 knitting needles less than 1 ball worsted weight cotton yarn k = knit kfb = knit in front and back of same stitch bobble = bind off yo = yarn over k2tog = knit two stitches together k2togtbl = knit two stitches together through back loops sl1 = slip 1 stitch st = stitch cast on 2 sl1 k2 turn sl1 k1 k2togtbl yo k2togtbl k to last st kfb increasing row 1 bobble 1 kfb decreasing row 2 sl1 kfb 1 bo1 k1 k2togtbl yo k2togtbl k to 3 sl1 kfb kfb last st kfb 4 bobble 1 k2 kfb 2 bo1 k1 k2togtbl yo k2togtbl k to 5 bobble 1 kfb kfb k1 end 6 sl1 knit 5 3 sl1 k1 k2togtbl yo k2togtbl k to end 7 sl1 k2 yo k to last st kfb 4 sl1 k1 k2togtbl yo k2togtbl k to 8 bobble 1 k2 yo kto last st kfb last st kfb 9 bobble 1 k2 yo k to end repeat row 1 through 4 until you have 10 sl1 k2 yo k to end 7 st left on your needle 11 sl1 k2 yo k to last st kfb repeat row 7 through 10 until size finishing desired ending with row 8 1 bo1 k to last st kfb 2 bo1 k2togtbl k1 k2tog k1 turning row 3 sl1 k to end 1 sl1 k2 turn sl1 k2 turn sl1 k1 4 sl1 k2tog kfb turn sl1 kfb turn bo1 k2 turn sl1 k2 turn sl1 k1 k2togtbl yo 5 bo1 k2tog k2togtbl k to end 6 k2tog pull yarn through loop finish 2 sl1 k2 turn sl1 k2 turn sl1 k1 off turn sl1 kfb turn bo1 k2 turn
